DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate validity , reliability reproducibility digital model obtain iTero® Lava Digital® comparison traditional plaster model .
DOC.brief_title: Validity Digital Models Obtained With iTero® Lava Digital® Comparison With Plaster Models .
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study evaluate validity , reliability reproducibility dental measurement obtain digital model iTero® comparison obtain plaster model ( gold standard ) digital model Lava Digital® . The secondary objective compare two different impression material ( i.e . alginate polyvinylsiloxane ( PVS ) ) determine whether impression material use affect accuracy measurement . Statistical analysis : - Intraclass correlation coefficient ( ICC ) use evaluate intra- inter-operator reliability measurement method , i.e . plaster model digital model . - A paired t-test use determine validity digital measurement iTero® , compare impression material ( alginate PVS ) . - A Bland-Altman plot also use compare two digital method ( Lava Digital® et iTero® ) plaster model . - Dahlberg coefficient use evaluate technical error associate measurement make .
DOC.criteria: Aged 12 30 year old ( male female ) complete permanent dentition first molar first molar interproximal modification ( e.g . decay , large restoration , abnormal tooth morphology ) could affect mesiodistal width teeth Dentition severe crowd ( could therefore affect mesiodistal width teeth )
